name: Appropriation and payment Note Chapter heading amended by L 1984, c 171, 1(2). Salary of legislators:  members, $34,200; presiding officers, $41,700.
text: Appropriation and payment.  Moneys provided by the allowances and funds authorized by this chapter shall be paid out of any available appropriation made by the legislature for expenses of the house concerned in the same manner as other expenses of the legislature not inconsistent with this chapter. [L 1969, c 5, pt of §1]
